version_description:
This update provides you with:
• iOS9 compatibility improvements
• Updated charts from X-Traverse
• Anchor alarm audio alert fixed
• Various bug fixes & speed improvements

Please email us if you run into any issues:
ios-support@inavx.com

If you enjoy using iNavX, please take a minute to leave a review in the App Store. If you've reviewed a previous version please resubmit it as ratings reset with each update. We really appreciate your support!

This update provides you with:
• Chart list updates in real-time from X-Traverse
• Touch actions work again on iPhone 6S & 6S Plus
• Various bug fixes & speed improvements

Please email us if you run into any issues:
ios-support@inavx.com

If you enjoy using iNavX, please take a minute to leave a review in the App Store. If you've reviewed a previous version please resubmit it as ratings reset with each update. We really appreciate your support!

This update provides you with:
• Fixes issues with app launching under iOS7
• Fixes recording while app is backgrounded
• Various other bug fixes & speed improvements

Please email us if you run into any issues:
ios-support@inavx.com

If you enjoy using iNavX, please take a minute to leave a review in the App Store. If you've reviewed a previous version please resubmit it as ratings reset with each update. We really appreciate your support!

This update provides you with:
• Fixes NSXMLParserError at launch
• Fixes distance measure tool display
• Various other bug fixes & speed improvements

Please email us if you run into any issues:
ios-support@inavx.com

If you enjoy using iNavX, please take a minute to leave a review in the App Store. If you've reviewed a previous version please resubmit it as ratings reset with each update. We really appreciate your support!

iNavX v5.0 is finally here, including:
• Vastly simplified interface for easier navigation
• Integrated store for easy chart in-app purchases
• Tons of other bug fixes & speed improvements

Please email us if you run into any issues:
ios-support@inavx.com

If you enjoy using iNavX, please take a minute to leave a review in the App Store. If you've reviewed a previous version please resubmit it as ratings reset with each update. We really appreciate your support!

Thanks for all your feedback on v5.0!
Our next few releases will address that feedback.

To kick things off, v5.0.1 includes the following:
• You can again access expired charts saved to your device
• Crash fixed when toggling 'Link' under TCP/IP > UDP
• Anchor alarm minimum distance restored to 0.01 NM
• Plus, fixes for a handful of other minor bug fixes

iNavX v5.0 is finally here, including:
• Vastly simplified interface for easier navigation
• Integrated store for easy chart in-app purchases
• Tons of other bug fixes & speed improvements

Please email us if you run into any issues:
ios-support@inavx.com

If you enjoy using iNavX, please take a minute to leave a review in the App Store. If you've reviewed a previous version please resubmit it as ratings reset with each update. We really appreciate your support!

Thanks for all your feedback on v5.0!
Our next few releases will address that feedback.

Next up, v5.0.2 includes the following:
• Redesigned GRIB tools
• Anchor alarm functioning correctly again
• Quick access to Account from the charts menu
• Fixes Explorer Chartbooks & Waterway Guides
• Fixes crash when accessing charts under iOS7
• AyeTides now accessible from all chart types
• Plus, a handful of other minor bug fixes

To kick things off, v5.0.1 includes the following:

• Crash fixed when toggling 'Link' under TCP/IP > UDP
• Anchor alarm minimum distance restored to 0.01 NM
• Plus, fixes for a handful of other minor bug fixes

Announcing the iNavX API! Streamlining your experience by:
• Modernizing our backend API to speed chart access
• Continuous account sync for secure backups
• Now download GRIBs in a single step
• More bug fixes & speed improvements

• Swipe to update/delete a chart in My Charts
• Swipe to delete exported files in iNavX Cloud
• Hide Vessel name in Instrument > Settings
• More bug fixes & speed improvements
